The SHINSENGUMI FILMOGRAPHY issue of the long running small press 
journal M.A.M.A. (Martial Arts Movie Associates) is just out and no 
Shinsengumi fan should be without it. (It contains more titles than our 
current online version btw)

AND by purchasing the issue it also entitles SHQ members to $10 off the 
regular price of mentioned films carried by Samuraidvd.com 
(approximately 2/3 of the 131 films mentioned. (Sale price $20)

M.A.M.A. #54 can be obtained for 5 bucks postage included from William 
Connolly ( scinema@... ) or his web page 
http://home.earthlink.net/~scinema/ or people can send him $5 at
William Connolly
1200 N .June ST  Apt 207
Hollywood CA 90038

I have an older issue of this journal for those of you worried about 
scams so I know it does, in fact, exist. I already put my order in.

-- 
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
The Blog-- http://barbarasheridan.blogspot.com/
